name: Gravity Run (leo-li)
description:
Make the treacherous run to the heart of the mountain with the help of your gravity boots. You can't rely on them too much, though, as they have limited energy.

Your boots recharge slowly over time and when you pick up batteries. Collecting batteries past the maximum charge will overcharge your boots. Overcharged energy will slowly drain away.

CONTROLS
Left/right to move
Z (or C or N) to jump
X (or V or M) to flip gravity
(Enter up, up, down, down, up, down, up, down on the title screen to start with more hearts.)

Made for My First Game Jam Winter 2019. The (optional) theme was "love."
